casebody.data:
COOK
v.
SMITH. No. 161P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

*739The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of April 2008 by Plaintiff to Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
